nodes.text: This garment was the personal property of Atton Rand, one of the Lost Jedi and companion of the Jedi Exile, at the time of his incarceration at the Peragus Mining Facility and his only means of protection during the Skirmish at Peragus II. A durable jacket, it was comparable to light armor and protected its owner from a variety of hazards.
In the game, only the playable character Atton Rand can equip this article of clothing.
